name: Alien Survivor | Never Mind Games Jam #1
name_original: Alien Survivor | Never Mind Games Jam #1
description:
Game Jam theme 

Adapt to Survive

Controls 
  • WASD to move
  • Space bar to interact
  • Alt+F4 to close
Gameplay
  • Trees spawn sticks to feed the fire.
  • Purple bushes spawn berries to satiate your hunger.
  • Moving away from the fire will consume your body temperature.
  • Interacting with the fire to pick it up and relocate it will consume your health.
  • Interacting with a stick and bringing it to the fire will feed the fire.
  • Interacting with a berry will feed your hunger.

How long can you survive?
